translator_notes: This page concludes the table of contents
Chapter 80 is the final chapter of Cao Xueqin's authentic text
Three appendices follow the main text
Electronic edition notes document the collation process
research_notes: The 80-chapter structure confirms this is the authentic version, not the 120-chapter Cheng-Gao continuation
